spell.desc.barkskin: Grants damage reduction and health recovery buffs to nearby allies.
spell.desc.purification: Removes all debuffs from nearby allies and yourself.
spell.desc.weakness_aura: Emit a crippling aura that reduces nearby enemies' Armor by 30% for 8 seconds.
spell.desc.entangling_thorns: Anchor a thornfield at your target point; spores immobilize foes and inflict [calc:entangling_thorns] elemental damage over time.
spell.desc.shadow_walk: Blink behind your target, deal [calc:shadow_walk] physical damage, and briefly increase your dodge chance.
spell.desc.shuriken: Throw a shuriken that deals [calc:shuriken] physical damage and inflicts Bleed for 5 seconds.
spell.desc.shunjin: Perform an instant strike that deals [calc:shunjin] physical damage and grants 30% attack speed for 5 seconds.
spell.desc.swing_scythe: Spin your chain-sickle, pulling nearby foes to you and dealing [calc:swing_scythe] physical damage five times.
spell.desc.shadow_secret: Enter a deadly trance, instantly shaving 30 seconds off spell cooldowns while gaining 50% attack speed and 30% crit chance for 12 seconds.
spell.desc.toxic_edge: Imbue your blade with five Toxic Edge stacks; your next melee strikes consume a stack to poison enemies.
spell.desc.ryuusei_ranbu: Unleash a five-hit spinning strike that deals [calc:ryuusei_ranbu] physical damage around you.
